scripts.build: yarn run build-js && yarn run build-css
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css' && postcss --use cssnano --dir static/minified 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build-js: cp node_modules/d3/build/d3.min.js static/js/modules && cp node_modules/d3-geo/build/d3-geo.min.js static/js/modules && cp node_modules/topojson-client/dist/topojson-client.min.js static/js/modules
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
